text: hi guys it's so important to have a
sharp knife let me show you how to
sharpen it first up you need to get a
steel start with a heel of the knife at
a slight angle and we go evenly to the
tip and we do the other side so one two
really that's all you should need to do
and that's called nice maintenance but
it's really hard to take a blunt knife
to show up on just one of these one of
the things I found most reliable is this
little baby so put it on something
totally flat like that push it down put
the clamp down medium heavy weight
medium weight medium light just take the
weight off it every time and then very
light just gracefully take it through
like that one two three four to get that
edge there's a really simple reliable
way to get the edge back on your knife
and then maintain it good luck and if
you want more tips click on the link
below
